name: Truss
headline: Banking for construction
description: Truss is an all-in-one banking and payment automation platform for construction businesses. With Truss, construction companies can manage bill payments, receivables, and corporate cards in one place. They can save time on manual data entry by integrating Truss with their existing tools and automating the full billing cycle, from invoicing and reconciliation.

# The all-in-one banking solution for ‍contractors
Manage invoices, bills and cards in one place. Built for construction businesses of every size.
[Get started free](https://trusspayments.com/<https:/app.trusspayments.com/auth/register>)[Book a demo](https://trusspayments.com/<https:/meetings.trusspayments.com/meetings/matthew705/sitedemo>)
Truss is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by Thread Bank; Member FDIC.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656440242f3bb75b0b499ddc_bank-card-2.webp)
No transfer fees
No monthly costs
No minimums
##### Trusted by leading contractors.
![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/655c2cb74fb51f126b058d9a_1-richard-miller.png)![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/655c2cb7504f0d191fb10376_2-daylight-concepts.png)![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/655c2cb7d1f5d14e8fa56d62_3-bat-city.png)![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65aac5f636bd60b4131dd34e_meldrum%20design.png)![OE logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656e1fb1e5185fe2d9edfb71_silver-peak.png)![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65f22f2041749f2f252e0be6_titan%20logo.png)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65778d50e22427778ca4b7b4_hh-2-v3.webp?twic=v1/resize=200)
[Explore receivables](https://trusspayments.com/</products/receivables>)
Payment received
Receivables
## Get paid faster
Make it simple for you and your customers. Accept payments online in minutes.
  * Accept ACH and card payments for free
  * Access and use funds instantly
  * On-site mobile check deposits
  * Custom-branded payment portal
  * Fast & easy customer checkout
  * Collect progress payments


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656113b1fea2c70a0e2b687f_get-paid.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656113b2d6b8b72d4dcaf8e6_get-paid-grad.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656113b2d6b8b72d4dcaf8e6_get-paid-grad.webp?twic=v1/resize=100)
### Truss eliminates unnecessary meetups with clients and vendors. That's time I can now use to sell or design work. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656033eb27108fb05cb22968_miller.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/661f99c652ea2ce0021de0b5_image%2051%20-50.png)
##### Craig Mauer,Silver Peak Design Build
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<https:/www.trusspayments.com/blog-posts/checks-ruin-a-productive-schedule>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/661f9ab789ad0b21eb6362dd_%241%2C000%2B%20monthly%20savings.png)
### Truss eliminates the need to waste my staff's time picking up and depositing checks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656033eb27108fb05cb22968_miller.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656033eb27108fb05cb22968_miller.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)
##### Richard Miller,Richard Miller Custom Homes
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/</blog-posts/truss-eliminates-the-need-to-waste-my-or-staffs-time-picking-up-and-depositing-checks>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65603ba4f6ceddb9dbde4c2a_18%20hours-saved-monthly.svg)
### Truss gives us the ability to get paid faster and keep our vendors paid. It keeps the ball moving.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656033ebcb7ba67b24b6a8b9_ayala.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66c90602c97ec4daa151d894_image%2057.png)
##### Jake Bruton,Aarow Building
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<https:/www.trusspayments.com/blog-posts/cash-flow-kills-construction-businesses>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66c3a8c4cac912dc35469d60_10%20days%20faster%20receivables.png)
### Truss gives me the support I don’t think I could get from any bank. I can reach out to our account manager and get a response within an hour!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656033ebcb7ba67b24b6a8b9_ayala.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656033ebcb7ba67b24b6a8b9_ayala.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)
##### René Ayala,Daylight Concepts
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/</blog-posts/we-want-to-give-clients-a-secure-way-to-pay>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656032d9bcd6fb961311db1b_In-house-support.svg)
Payables
## Pay trades your way
Pay subcontractors online in minutes and give them instant access to funds.
  * Send ACH payments for free
  * Mail checks from the dashboard
  * Integrated approval workflows
  * Vendors don’t need a Truss account
  * Integrated check printing


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656113b2c52530761433e832_pay-trades-grad.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656113b2c52530761433e832_pay-trades-grad.webp?twic=v1/resize=100)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656113b1c52530761433e6e4_pay-trades.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656045a7b43347fc4e33ada5_hh-3.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65778d517eb84372100978a9_hh-3-v3.webp?twic=v1/resize=200)
[Explore payables](https://trusspayments.com/</products/payables>)
Payment sent
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656045a723e3f519765d2603_hh-4.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65778d50b421fd863b075787_hh-4-v3.webp?twic=v1/resize=200)
[Explore cards](https://trusspayments.com/</products/cards>)
Card issued
Expense Management
## Control card spend
Effortlessly manage card expenses and stay on budget every time.
  * Issue unlimited cards to staff
  * Individual real-time spend controls
  * Smart expense filtering
  * Project tagging
  * Mobile receipt capture
  * Flexible rewards


Business Checking
## Upgrade your operating account
Discover modern banking, tailored for construction businesses like yours.
  * $3M FDIC insurance for funds on deposit through Thread Bank, Member FDIC[1](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
  * Personalized account management
  * White-glove onboarding
  * No account fees or minimums
  * In-house support
  * Custom user permissions


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65602edfe347039e65989412_home-grad-1.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65602edfe347039e65989412_home-grad-1.webp?twic=v1/resize=100)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65604587b78c3a5464921e80_hh-1.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656e245638e7a058350a8914_home-streamline-2.webp?twic=v1/resize=200)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65fb81960fd1c5e111de99d8_truss-pattern-bg-3.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6653472d4a31d076388656e1_home-bc-grad-update.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664f512efc35583a0ec87d2c/664f512efc35583a0ec87f85_truss-pattern-bg-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6653472d4a31d076388656ac_home-bc-update.png)
[Explore business checking](https://trusspayments.com/</products/business-checking>)
Accounting Integration
## Seamlessly integrate with your workflow
Integrate Truss with your accounting system, to automate the full cycle from invoice creation to reconciliation.
Automate completely with
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560b9a34d569e674f8645d6_quickbooks.svg)
Connect to any accounting system
Authenticate via Plaid
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560bfc80ed21cb04392d692_plaid.webp)
Import via CSV
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560bfc8610948880af35a28_csv.webp)
### Trusted and regulated
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/placeholder.svg)
$3M FDIC insurance for funds on deposit provided through our banking partner Thread Bank; Member FDIC.[1](https://trusspayments.com/<#footnote>)
[Review security](https://trusspayments.com/</security>)
![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66ba9b6a62d2e8fafb2bf63f_thread.png)![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560cdff4af39c62c0d282b8_bl-2.webp)![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560cdff3fd619b5b031ebb8_bl-3.webp)![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65f87d0130b4f349de000e10_NARI-partner.png)![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66103d5810fc60171ffd8c87_AGC-member.png)
### The time, gas and energy I’ve saved since we started using Truss is shocking – it’s quick, seamless and FREE.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/661f99b1964158ddf25df95d_image%2050%20copy.png)
##### Mike Connors‍Titan Siding, Windows & Exteriors
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/65f32b02f442a9c95e785c2c_%242%2C000%20monthly%20savings.png)
### Truss has taken our company to the next level. We've gained so much time back from driving around picking up checks and going to the bank.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66e1cd52553659ef659e4fa9_image%2060.png)
##### **Thomas Wellens‍****Sweetwater Marine Construction**
[ Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/66ea0262c01e59de261064c5_6%20hours%20saved%20weekly.png)
### Without Truss, we would be drowning in accounting work. Now, everyone can do what they do best, which is the actual work. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/668ec2cf86ade8054829bedd_image%2054.png)
##### **William Magarity‍****Val Collective**
[ Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/668ec408fb336bd34af6d7fd_10%20hours%20saved%20monthly.png)
### Switching to Truss is fast and simple – a tiny investment compared to the time saved long-term.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656979969606fec68fa439d6_david.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)
##### David PhillipsNZ Builders
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6569791363931ea93e2504a1_10days.svg)
### Our clients still have the option to pay via check or bank transfer but nobody really uses it. Truss is our client’s preference for large payments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/656979968a65a2c6c4f3593b_casey.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)
##### Casey Grey,The Conscious Builder
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6569791307cc429c9baef1a7_3xfaster.svg)
### Truss is simple and modern. You don’t have to leave your house. You don’t have to send a check. You don’t have to make a bank draft.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65697bc2dfd51ffa360505d2_hutchinsons-2.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)
##### Scott Hutchinson,Hutchinson Contracting
[Read story](https://trusspayments.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656979136a1ea6c7b7d2c862_5-7days.svg)
### It’s difficult to quantify the value of not having to chase clients for checks. The value is infinite.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/6560d0201e0279217d3a6d95_hutchinsons.webp)
![](https://onenet.twic.pics/truss/65697996f8059ed5c41475b9_erik.webp?twic=v1/resize=50)

1Your deposits qualify for up to $3,000,000 in FDIC insurance coverage when placed at program banks in the Thread Bank deposit sweep program. Your deposits at each program bank become eligible for FDIC insurance up to $250,000, inclusive of any other deposits you may already hold at Thread Bank in the same ownership capacity. You can access the terms and conditions of the sweep program at <https://thread.bank/sweep-disclosure/> and a list of program banks at <https://thread.bank/program-banks/>. Please contact customerservice@thread.bank with questions on the sweep program.
Truss is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by Thread Bank; Member FDIC. The Truss Visa® Card is issued by Thread Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa cards are accepted.

### Truss eliminates unnecessary meetups with clients and vendors. That's time I can now use to sell or design work. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff71e1e6a8a33151da07ac/656033eb27108fb05cb22968_miller.webp)

1Your deposits qualify for up to $3,000,000 in FDIC insurance coverage when placed at program banks in the Thread Bank deposit sweep program. Your deposits at each program bank become eligible for FDIC insurance up to $250,000, inclusive of any other deposits you may already hold at Thread Bank in the same ownership capacity. You can access the terms and conditions of the sweep program at <https://thread.bank/sweep-disclosure/> and a list of program banks at <https://thread.bank/program-banks/>. Please contact customerservice@thread.bank with questions on the sweep program.
Truss is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by Thread Bank; Member FDIC. The Truss Visa® Card is issued by Thread Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa cards are accepted.

generated_description:
### Truss: Banking for Construction

**What is Truss?**
Founded in 2019 and emerging from Y Combinator's Batch S21, Truss is a financial technology company based in Victoria, Canada. Its mission is simple yet focused: to provide streamlined banking solutions specifically for the construction industry. Instead of the typical banking menu, Truss delivers an all-in-one platform that automates payments, manages bill payments, receivables, and corporate cards, all tailored to the unique needs of construction businesses.

**Core Offerings**
At the heart of Truss’s proposition is a robust suite of products designed to save time and reduce administrative overhead:

1. **Business Checking**: Offers enhanced FDIC insurance, no account fees, and no minimum balance requirements, tailored to contractors' needs.
   
2. **Receivables**: A feature that allows construction companies to collect payments more efficiently, accepting ACH and card payments online without incurring any fees.

3. **Cards**: Issue unlimited corporate cards for staff, with the ability to earn rewards and manage expenses easily.

4. **Payables**: Simplifies the process of paying subcontractors online and provides instant access to funds.

Coming soon, Truss also plans to introduce a financing option, which should further solidify its position as a comprehensive financial partner for construction companies.

**The Problem They Solve**
Construction businesses often waste valuable time on managing invoices, payments, and banking logistics. Truss aims to eliminate this inefficiency by integrating seamlessly with existing accounting tools, automating the full billing cycle from invoicing to reconciliation. Customers report saving significant time—some as much as 18 hours a month—by removing the drudgery associated with billing and payments.

**Who’s Behind Truss?**
With a lean team of 12 employees, Truss operates with agility and a customer-first mentality. Brad Flora serves as their Group Partner, guiding their strategic direction.

**Key Takeaways**
- **Target Market**: Construction companies of all sizes.
- **Unique Selling Proposition**: A comprehensive banking solution dedicated to construction, emphasizing ease of use and automation to streamline, not complicate, the payment processes.
- **Web Presence**: You can learn more about their offerings on their website: [Truss Payments](https://trusspayments.com).

In short, if you’re in the construction business and tired of the hassles that typically accompany financial transactions, Truss might just be the tool you need to keep your operations running smoothly and cost-effectively.
